full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Small Tactical Terminal (STT) KOR-24A, Radio**
=================================================================

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Reference Number:** cb-215-2257972

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247924/A

**Closing Date and Time:** 14:00 EST, November 17, 2023

**Deadline for Statement of Capabilities:** November 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Department of National Defence**
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1K2, Canada
	+ Contact: Linda Voyer, linda.voyer@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-0819

**Notice Description:**

The Department of National Defence intends to award a contract for the supply of two Small Tactical Terminal (STT) KOR-24A radios to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The specific product requested is:

	* NSN: 5821-01-642-5782
	* Part Number: 1349587
	* OEM: L3Harris
	* Description: SMALL TACTICAL TERMINAL (STT) KOR-24A RADIO; RECEIVER -TRANSMITER

**Tender Process:**

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), indicating the department's intention to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier. Interested suppliers can submit a statement of capabilities by November 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Failure to submit a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements may result in the contracting officer proceeding with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

**Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23722/w8485-247924_a--advance_contract_award_notice-small-tactical-terminal-%28stt-kor-24a-radios-en.pdf

**Notice Attachments:** Not applicable

**Contract Category:** Goods (43190000)

**Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**End User:** Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF)
